name: The Depths Expedition

objectives.description: Speak with Callum about the Depths
Travel to Depths entrance in Memorial Garden (8, 17)
Navigate Depths Level 1 (5 rooms)
Defeat the Depths L1 floor guardian
Collect dissolved memory fragment from guardian chamber
Return to Callum

completionDialogue: Callum: The Depths... the dissolved civilizations stored their densest memories underground. What you found is just the beginning.

name: Hark's Masterwork

objectives.description: Speak with Hark at the Blacksmith
Collect Crag Golem core from Sunridge
Collect Crystal Shard from Preserver Agent/Captain
Collect Dissolved Metal from Depths Level 2
Bring materials to Hark
Wait 1 in-game day for forging
Collect class-specific masterwork weapon

completionDialogue: Hark: There. My finest work. The Crag Golem's core gives it weight, the crystal gives it edge, and the dissolved metal... it hums.

name: Nyro's Dream Visions

objectives.description: Speak with Nyro about dream visions
Rest at the inn 5 total times (unique dream each time)
After 5th dream, dream fragment materializes
Broadcast dream fragment at Inn's hearth Resonance Stone
Witness permanent lore projection activation

completionDialogue: Nyro: I always knew there was something behind that fireplace. I think it was waiting for the right dreams. Yours.

name: The Dissolved Choir's Instruments

objectives.description: Return to Listener's Camp after Resonance recall
Learn about awakened Choir Instruments
Find 5 Choir Instruments in Settled Lands Resonance Stones
Bring all 5 instruments to the Amphitheater (25, 25)

completionDialogue: Audiomancer: Five instruments. Five voices of the Choir. When you placed them, I heard the song they sang at the end. It wasn't sad. It was proud.

name: The Stagnation Breaker

objectives.description: Speak with Callum about freeing Lira
Travel to Heartfield Stagnation Clearing (35, 30)
Defeat Preserver reinforcements (2x Agent + 1x Captain)
Broadcast potency 4+ joy fragment into Lira's frozen form
Witness Lira's partial awakening message
Return to Callum with Lira's message

completionDialogue: Callum: She spoke? 'The First Memory is the key.' The Curator isn't just preserving the world — they're using the First Memory as the anchor for all stasis.
